reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for 6 nights and really could not fault it in any way. It was clean and tidy and as it was new everything was in good order. We did not eat in the restaurant or take breakfast so could not comment on this but the bar was relaxed. The staff were excellent and friendly and nothing was too much trouble.
reviews.title: Excellent - If a little out of the way

reviews.text: If I had to be critical of the hotel it is a little in the middle of no where so i would have thought you need a car (although we did not look at where public transport goes from) as we had the car, but there is a chemist and 2 banks nearby and what looked to be a bistro type restaurant although again we did not try this. The car parking was free and plentiful and very safe as was the surrounding area which appeared to be an up and coming development of fairly luxury flats etc. with offices for international companies.
reviews.title: New hotel, still some teething problems

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a modern hotel, outside of the town. The service was professional and the food in the restaurant was nice and at a reasonable price. We stayed for two nights whilst touring and found it suited our requirements.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Decided to book here after reading the positive reviews. To our delight this hotel did not disappoint us. It is outside of town but not extremely difficult to find in a very quiet area. Staff was very friendly. Room was very clean, beds were comfortable. Hotel has a sauna, gym, and jacuzzi. Bathrooms were super clean. free wifi internet was included in price which came in handy with laptops. Would definitely stay here again if in the area and looking to explore various areas.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!

reviews.text: We arrived into the Aix TGV station from Paris at night, and this was a quick cab rode from the station.
reviews.title: Great hotel for car travellers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is great and the staff made us feel right at home. We did not have a car, but the girl at the desk printed us a bus schedule into Aix en Provence. The bus stop is less than a ten minute walk from the hotel and provided us with a nice, worry free ride into the center of Aix.
reviews.title: awesome bed, far from town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we returned to the hotel on the bus, we saw a small Lidl Grocery store, next to a small cafe/bistro. Also close by the bus stop is another small coffee type shop. We just picked up some goodies for our room, as the selections at the restaurant were limited.
reviews.title: Nice place
